synopsis.text: Claimed to be a young girl by some and an old woman by others, the enigmatic Raven Consort resides deep within the imperial palace. Despite her title as a consort, she has never been summoned to the emperor's bedchamber. Instead, she is revered for her mysterious abilities, which range from locating lost items to casting deadly curses. When the current emperor seeks her assistance, their encounter uncovers a secret that will forever alter the course of history. Who is the Raven Consort, and what hidden power does she possess? Discover the truth in this captivating anime that blends mystery, supernatural elements, and historical intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
